title: master bedroom for rent in Troy
posting_body: Rent for master room is $500 plus utility (Electric, Gas, water).
There would be a security deposit during move in of $750 (total $1250).
FYI your deposit is returned upon your leave.
Plus WIFI & maid service 2x per month split 3 ways.
This is a 3 roommates living situation 1 bathroom.
About the available master room: Unfurnished, with 3 closets.
The house is in great location.
Living room with couches and big screen TV access \ internet options to go in on.
Looking for CLEAN responsible, Mid 20s-30s* College pursuing or professionals for 6m-1year contracts.
If you are going to contact me I would recommend describe yourself, tell me you read and understand the listing because I get a ton of messages.
Tenants don't smoke inside and no animals allowed—there is a house cat in main areas as fyi if allergic.
